article: Mary is  _  English girl, but she is in France now. She is six  _  old. Her mother says to her. "You are six,  _  you will be school here. You will like the school because it's a  _  school." "Is it an English school?" Mary asks. "Yes, it  _  ." Mother answers. Mary goes to school. The teachers  _  very friendly and speak good  _  . And there  _  two other English girls in the class,  _  . She begins to like the school. Her mother takes her  _  school  _  the morning and brings her home in the afternoon. One day ,when her mother is at school, Mary runs out  _  the classroom and says, "We have a  _  girl in our class today. She is six, too. She is very nice,  _  she isn't English. She is a German ." "Doesn't she speak English?" Mary's mother asks. "No, but she always laughs  _  English." She says happily.
